skills.name: SEIZE
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.

skills.name: STAKE
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• Gain Critical Strike chance with 100% Critical Chance for 2 turns if the enemy is Marked.

skills.name: MISERY
desc: Inflicts all enemies with a Mark at the start of battle. Marks can be consumed with Perfect Hits to deal true damage.
